seo.title: Masana'antar Automation & Kayan Aikin Kula da Wutar Lantarki | PLC SCADA DCS Systems | Powerton Engineering India
seo.description: Kamfanin masana'antar automation a Indiya wanda ya ƙware a masana'antar kula da wutar lantarki, shirye-shiryen PLC, haɗin tsarin SCADA, injiniyan DCS, da hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu. Yin hidima ga masana'antar harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai & gas, masana'antu, da masana'antar kemikal. ISO ta tabbatar da ƙwarewa sama da shekaru 15. seo.title: Game da Powerton Engineering | Kamfanin Masana'antar Automation da Kula da Wutar Lantarki Mai Tabbatar da ISO Tun 2008
seo.description: Powerton Engineering Pvt. Ltd. - Kamfanin sarrafa masana'antu mai tabbatar da ISO 9001:2015 tare da ƙwarewa sama da shekaru 15 a masana'antar kula da wutar lantarki, tsarin PLC SCADA DCS, kayan aiki, da sarrafa masana'antu. Babban mai haɗa tsarin sarrafa kansa yana hidima ga harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai & gas, kemikal, masana'antu, da masana'antar kula da ruwa a duk faɗin Indiya. Mai ba da hanyoyin injiniya da aka ba da lambar yabo tare da ayyuka sama da 1200 masu nasara. Ƙungiyar ƙwararru a cikin Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, Honeywell, fasahohin ABB automation. Hedkwatar ta kasance a Noida tare da yaduwar sabis na pan-Indiya.

hero.title: Ƙwarewar Injiniya Tun 2008
hero.subtitle: Amintaccen Abokin Hulɗarku a cikin Masana'antar Automation da Hanyoyin Injiniyan Lantarki

story.title: Tafiyarmu da Hangen Nesa
story.description1: An kafa a cikin 2008 tare da hangen nesa don ƙarfafa masana'antu ta hanyar kirkire-kirkire da kyawawan halaye, Powerton Engineering ta kasance a sahun gaba na sarrafa masana'antu da hanyoyin injiniyan lantarki. Tafiyarmu ta fara ne da manufa mai sauƙi amma mai ƙarfi: don isar da hanyoyin injiniya na yankan da ke haifar da ci gaban masana'antu da ingancin aiki.
story.description2: Tsawon shekaru, mun girma daga ƙaramin kamfanin injiniya zuwa amintaccen abokin tarayya ga masana'antu a duk faɗin China da kuma duniya baki ɗaya. Ƙungiyarmu ta ƙwararrun injiniyoyi da ƙwararrun fasaha suna aiki ba dare ba rana don isar da hanyoyin da ba kawai suka cika ba har ma sun zarce tsammanin abokan cinikinmu.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.description: Don samar da sabbin hanyoyin injiniya, masu aminci, da dorewa waɗanda ke ba abokan cinikinmu damar cimma ƙwarewar aiki da haifar da ci gaban masana'antu.

vision.title: Hangena Nesa
vision.description: Don zama babban mai ba da sabis na sarrafa masana'antu da hanyoyin injiniyan lantarki, wanda aka sani don ƙwarewar fasaha, inganci, da sadaukarwa ga nasarar abokin ciniki.

seo.title: Fayilolin Ayyukan Masana'antu | Nazarin Lamura na Kula da Panel | PLC SCADA aiwatarwa | Injiniyan Powerton
seo.description: Bincika 1200+ nasarar ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu a duk faɗin Indiya - sarrafa masana'antar harhada magunguna, tsarin kula da tashar wutar lantarki, sarrafa kayan aikin distillery, ayyukan EPC na hasken rana, ruwa SCADA, sarrafa masana'antar abin sha, da kayayyakin aikin cajin EV. Nazarin shari'o'i na gaske waɗanda ke nuna shirye-shiryen PLC, haɗin tsarin SCADA, aiwatar da DCS, da shigarwar panel na lantarki don manyan kamfanoni kamar IOCL, Dalmia, Coca-Cola, Reliance, IIT Bhubaneswar. Ƙwarewar da aka tabbatar a cikin sarrafa tsari, kayan aiki, da ayyukan masana'antu masu mahimmanci.

seo.title: Samu Lissafi & Kalkuleta Kuɗi - Hanyoyin Sarrafa Masana'antu | Injiniyan Powerton
seo.description: Nemi cikakken bayani kan sarrafa tsari, bangarorin kula da wutar lantarki, kayan aiki, tsarin SCADA, shirye-shiryen PLC, da hanyoyin injiniya na al'ada. Yi amfani da kalkuleta mai mu'amala don samun ƙididdiga nan take tare da farashin masana'antu. Akwai shawarwari kyauta. Yin hidima ga duk Indiya tare da farashi mai gasa da lokacin amsawa na 24-48.
seo.keywords: lissafin sarrafa masana'antu, farashin bangarorin kula da wutar lantarki, kuɗin sarrafa tsari, lissafin shirye-shiryen PLC, farashin tsarin SCADA, lissafin kayan aiki, kalkuleta kuɗin hanyoyin injiniya, lissafin tsarin kula da masana'antu, mai ƙididdige kuɗin aikin sarrafa kai, lissafin masana'antar bangarorin wutar lantarki, farashin sarrafa masana'antu na Indiya, kalkuleta kuɗin bangarorin kulawa, lissafin shawarwari na injiniya, farashin sarrafa masana'antu

seo.title: Tuntube Mu - Automation Masana'antu & Taimakon Injiniya na Lantarki | Injiniya na Powerton Noida
seo.description: Tuntube Injiniya na Powerton don sarrafa masana'antu, shirye-shiryen PLC, tsarin SCADA, bangarorin kulawa na lantarki, da tallafin fasaha. An samo shi a Noida, Indiya. Akwai tallafin gaggawa na 24/7. Kira +91-94627-71662 ko imel info@powertonengineering.com don shawarwari kyauta.

seo.title: Ayyuka & Ayyuka - Shiga Ƙungiyar Injiniya ta Powerton | Ayyukan Automation & Injiniya na Lantarki Noida
seo.description: Binciko damammaki masu ban sha'awa a Injiniya na Powerton. Muna ɗaukar injiniyoyin lantarki, injiniyoyin sarrafa kai, masu shirye-shiryen PLC, ƙwararrun SCADA, injiniyoyin kayan aiki, da injiniyoyin sabis na filin. Shiga ƙungiyarmu mai girma a Noida kuma yi aiki kan ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu na zamani. Albashi mai gasa, ci gaban aiki, da fa'idodi masu kyau.
seo.keywords: ayyukan injiniya na powerton, ayyukan injiniya noida, ayyukan injiniyan lantarki, ayyukan injiniyan sarrafa kai, ayyukan mai shirye-shiryen PLC, ayyukan injiniyan SCADA, ayyukan injiniyan kayan aiki, ayyukan injiniyan tsarin kulawa, ayyukan injiniyan sabis na filin, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu, ayyukan injiniyan lantarki india, ayyukan sarrafa kai noida, ayyukan injiniya uttar pradesh, ayyukan injiniya sabbi, ayyukan injiniya masu gogewa, ayyukan ƙwararrun sarrafa kai, ayyukan injiniyan ƙirar bangarorin kulawa, ayyukan injiniyan aiki, ayyukan injiniyan kulawa, ayyukan injiniyan aiki, ayyukan injiniya india, ayyukan injiniyan masana'antu

plcs.description: PLCs masu inganci daga manyan masana'antun: Siemens SIMATIC, Allen-Bradley CompactLogix, Schneider Modicon. Shirye-shiryen PLC na ƙwararru, shigarwa & tallafi a duk faɗin Indiya.

solarPanels.title: Bangaren Hasken Rana - Monocrystalline & Polycrystalline | Injiniya na Powerton
solarPanels.description: Bangaren hasken rana mai inganci: Monocrystalline (400W), Polycrystalline (320W), da Bifacial (450W). Cikakkun hanyoyin makamashi mai amfani da hasken rana tare da tallafin shigarwa a duk faɗin Indiya.
solarPanels.keywords: bangaren hasken rana, bangaren hasken rana na monocrystalline, bangaren hasken rana na polycrystalline, bangaren hasken rana na bifacial, tsarin makamashi mai amfani da hasken rana, makamashi mai sabuntawa, shigar da hasken rana india

scada.description: Tsarin SCADA mai ci gaba don kula da lokaci na ainihi, samun bayanai, da kulawa da tsari. Cikakkun hanyoyin SCADA tare da haɗin HMI da damar samun nesa.
